page.title: 05EDUCATION PART 2.
page.content: We looked in the oldest{LOG BOOK. We found that then school was alot different.The school was smaller than it is now.In 1895 there were only two class rooms and now there are four.In 1895 children stayed in the first class until they were 11 years when they moved into the class until they were 14 years when most children's formal education ended. Most of the children became agricultural workers because most of the area was farmland .School was closed when the farms where busy eg. at potato harvest. Discipline was a lot stricter because it says in the{LOG BOOK}that two boy where sent to court because they did not attend school enough times .The cane was often used for punishment.
